name: Family Mantra
description:
This game is still under development and is best played in Firefox.  Please leave a comment on what you think and area's of improvement.  Thanks!

Controls:

Left: Left, A

Up: Up, W

Right: Right, D

Down: Down, S

Action: Enter, Left Click

Menu: Esc

Use Item: LCtrl, Left Click

Next Item: X

Prev Item: Z

Next Member: E

Prev Member: Q

Use Magic: Space

Jump: LShift
